error.api_error: An error occurred while connecting to Actron Air Neo. Please try again later.
error.no_systems_found: No systems found in your account. Please check your account and try again.

user.description: Enter your Actron Air Neo account credentials to connect.

stale_auth.title: Actron Air Neo authentication expired
stale_auth.description:
The authentication for your {name} Actron Air Neo account has expired. This can happen if you changed your password or the token has expired.

Please click the 'Fix' button below to re-authenticate with your Actron Air Neo account.

confirm.title: Confirm repair
confirm.description: Do you want to apply this repair?
